GSD.description:
scsi: scsi_debug: Sanity check block descriptor length in resp_mode_select()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.9.294 by commit adcecd50da6cab7b4957cba0606771dcc846c5a9. For more details please see the references link.
